search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Feefo (feefo.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Feefo can be found at: [https://business.feefo.com](https://business.feefo.com)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Feefo Reviews Pricing and Plans | Verified Review Platform Pricing

extracted_content.content:
Compare the features in our pricing packages
--------------------------------------------

Feefo pricing packages offer flexible options to suit businesses of all sizes, from household names to local heroes. The **Essential Plan** provides key features for starting verified review collection, while the **Enhanced Plan** adds advanced analytics for deeper customer insights.  
For businesses with unique needs, our **Bespoke Plan** can be customised to align your review platform features with your goals.

Sends

200 500

### Essential

£99199 /month + VAT /month + VAT

### Enhanced

£249299 /month + VAT /month + VAT

Essential

Enhanced

Features
--------

Feefo Analytics: Essential

Monitor and uncover consumer motivations, bolster engagement, and prioritise enhancements

Google Partnership

Improve clickthrough rate and give customers confidence  in your brand

Social Sharing

Share your reviews to social media and show your customers what you really care about

Feedback Request Manager

Send feedback requests to multiple touch points at exactly  the right moment, from purchase to first use

NPS

Use a globally recognised metric to elevate your customer  experience and foster enduring trust in your brand

Insights Labels & Predictive Response

Manually label feedback to track themes in your data

Surveys

Reach out to customers through any channel, at any touchpoint – quick, open,  anonymous

SMS Feedback Requests

Gather more feedback by reaching your customers on the device they use the most

Custom Questions

Add bespoke questions to feedback request forms to amplify your customer knowledge

Ecolabels

Attract like-minded customers and celebrate your sustainability efforts with Ethy-approved badges

Location Feedback

Increase your brands’ visibility and measure customer satisfaction in  individual stores or branches. Choose from 1, 2-5, 6-10, 11+.

Review Booster

Kickstart your product launch using our trusted tester network or ask Feefo to generate feedback form links to send to your testers

Dynamic Topic Display​ & Highlighted Snippets

Show your customers pertinent reviews at the point of sale and arrange by themes

Custom Form Templates

Create your own custom form using a variety of question formats to obtain the information you require

\-

Communities

Elevate your interactions by nurturing a thriving hub where your customers  can easily discuss your brand

\-

Smartlink

Make it easier for your customers to share their feedback with an alternative review collection method to give you extra flexibility.

\-

AI Replies

Instantly respond to reviews with tailored responses produced by AI

\-

Moderation
----------

Moderation: Essential (by profanity  filter)

Moderation: Essential (by profanity  filter)

Full Human Moderation

Add a human touchpoint to your moderation process

\-

Full Moderation (blend of human and  AI)

Combine the prowess of human moderation and advanced AI technology  to review customer feedback at scale

\-

Reply Moderation

Elevate your brand’s reputation with our rigorous moderation  process that checks your online feedback

\-

Customer Success
----------------

Access to Knowledge base

Instant access to Feefo’s guides, tips, and best practices for maximising the platform. Perfect for self-help and detailed information

Live Chat Support

Get real-time assistance from our support team to resolve your issues quickly and efficiently

Email Support

Reach out to our support team via email for detailed assistance and resolutions at your convenience

Annual Account Review

Receive a comprehensive yearly review of your account to optimise performance and ensure you're getting the most out of Feefo's services

Dedicated Customer Success Manager

Enjoy personalised support and strategic guidance from your dedicated Customer Success Manager to help you achieve your business goals with Feefo

\-

Set up Services
---------------

6 Month Historical Upload

Upload and analyse up to six months of past data to gain insights and enhance your feedback strategy with Feefo

Form Setup

Upload and analyse up to six months of past data to gain insights and enhance your feedback strategy with Feefo

Import Reviews

Easily transfer and integrate your existing reviews into Feefo's platform to maintain a comprehensive feedback history

Product Matching

Effortlessly match your products for accurate review collection and analysis

Survey Set Up (per Survey)

Effortlessly configure and deploy surveys tailored to your specific needs and audience with Feefo's personal setup process

Setup as a Service

Instantly respond to reviews with tailored responses produced by AI

\-

Feed Mapping

Streamline your data integration process by mapping and pre-processing your feeds with Feefo's efficient tools, ensuring seamless data flow and accuracy

\-

Form Template Changes

Modify and customise your form templates ensuring they align perfectly with your evolving business needs and branding

\-

Custom Email Template

Get personalised email templates tailored to your brand's voice and style, ensuring impactful communication with your customers

\-

Data Services

\-

Certainly, simply provide us with the data, and we will seamlessly integrate it into your Feefo account. It's worth noting that not all feedback platforms facilitate the transfer of your reviews upon departure, so we recommend verifying this capability with your current provider.

We recommend starting your search as early as possible, ideally six months before your existing contract ends, as many platforms have auto-renewal policies. This proactive approach gives you time to fully understand your alternatives, review platform costs and to make well-informed decisions without feeling rushed.

Feefo reviews are built on trust, featuring genuine insights from authentic customers, who have actually used the products and services. We send feedback requests directly to real customers that have made a purchase from you, to guarantee that all reviews are genuine.

This process not only protects your business from fake reviews but also helps build trust with potential buyers. Authentic feedback can boost sales, enhance your reputation, and reinforce your brand as one people can rely on, with reviews they know are trustworthy.

All our plans include comprehensive customer support from real humans through phone, email, and live chat, ensuring that help is always available when you need it.

For businesses that require more personalised assistance, our Enhanced and Enterprise packages offer the option of a dedicated account manager to provide tailored support and guidance.

Whether you’re on a basic plan or a premium package, you can count on reliable and accessible customer service from the Feefo team.

Our standard contract duration is 12 months, providing you with long-term stability and commitment. We believe in flexibility, which is why we provide the convenience of monthly payments, so you can manage your budget effectively.

This payment structure ensures transparency and allows you to focus on growing your business without worrying about your review platform costs. Choose a plan that supports your goals with the peace of mind that comes from a stable, flexible contract.

Yes, you can add multiple websites to your package. While pricing is generally based on a per-domain model, we're open to discuss options as you add more domains. Reach out to us, and we’ll be happy to create a tailored solution that fits your specific needs.

No, we don’t charge additional fees for setup. They’re included with your subscription costs.

Discover pricing for Feefo verified customer reviews platform. Flexible pricing to suit your business.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing includes VAT and is structured for monthly payments. Bespoke plans are available for custom needs.
